nodes.description: Kekirawa Madatugama的NTJ清真寺被当地穆斯林和主清真寺信徒拆除
nodes.support_text: A mosque used by the National Thawheed Jama'at (NTJ) at Madatugama in Kekirawa was yesterday demolished by the area Muslims and devotees of the main mosque.

nodes.description: 主清真寺信托人M.H.M. Akbar Khan解释该寺由外国组织资助建造
nodes.support_text: the mosque used by NTJ was built with the funds of an organization based in a foreign country.

nodes.description: 信托人表示因国家当前形势决定拆除，认为无需两座清真寺
nodes.support_text: they had decided to demolish the mosque considering the current situation in the country and said there was no need of two mosques.

edges.support_text: Trustee of the main mosque M.H.M. Akbar Khan said the mosque used by NTJ was built with the funds of an organization based in a foreign country.
Trustee of the main mosque M.H.M. Akbar Khan said they had decided to demolish the mosque considering the current situation in the country.
